thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Archway - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Archway, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: dsoodles
title: Excellent Hotel
text: This hotel is conveniently placed for access to London as the underground station is literally 2 minutes away and is straight in on the Northern Line. Good shops and restaurants near by. Hotel clean and quiet. Rooms good . Bar available and restaurant. Definately recommend if visiting London and we would visit again especially as there is free parking at the hotel as well.
